messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
How are the results generated?
They are generated by rolling two or more six-sided dice and multiplying the result by 5 to generate a percentage number.
You are a helpful assistant.
How is the STR characteristic generated?
It is generated by rolling 3D6 and multiplying the result by 5.
You are a helpful assistant.
What determines the damage an investigator inflicts in hand-to-hand combat?
It is determined by the Strength characteristic.
You are a helpful assistant.
How is the CON characteristic generated?
It is generated by rolling 3D6 and multiplying the result by 5.
You are a helpful assistant.
What determines the damage an investigator inflicts in hand-to-hand combat?
This characteristic determines the damage an investigator inflicts in hand-to-hand combat.
You are a helpful assistant.
How is the Constitution characteristic generated?
CON (Constitution): Roll 3D6 and multiply by 5 to generate the Constitution characteristic.
You are a helpful assistant.
What does Constitution represent in the game?
Constitution represents health, vigor, and vitality.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if an investigator's Constitution reaches zero?
If constitution reaches zero, the investigator dies.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to an investigator's constitution if it reaches zero?
The investigator dies.
You are a helpful assistant.
How does a low characteristic score affect an investigator's chances of success?
It does not always mean the investigator will be hindered and unable to perform.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a common effect of having one or two low characteristic scores?
It can help to bring the investigator 'to life' and feel more real.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the typical effect of high characteristic scores in a roleplaying game?
The better the chances for that character's success in the game.
You are a helpful assistant.
Do low characteristic scores hinder investigators in Call of Cthulhu?
No, low characteristic scores do not always mean the investigator will be hindered.
You are a helpful assistant.
How to generate a Size characteristic in Call of Cthulhu?
Roll 2D6+6 and multiply by 5.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when an investigator has one or two low characteristic scores?
It can help bring the investigator 'to life' and feel more real.
You are a helpful assistant.
Why might a low education score be realistic?
It could be the result of never attending school and being forced to grow up on the streets.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the purpose of incorporating a low roll into the overall makeup of an investigator?
To make the investigator feel more real and to incorporate it into the overall makeup.
You are a helpful assistant.
How is the Size characteristic generated?
By rolling 2D6+6 and multiplying by 5.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Size used to determine?
Hit points, damage bonus, and build.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if investigators lose all SIZ points?
They presumably disappear—goodness knows to where!
You are a helpful assistant.
What determines hit points and damage bonus and build in the game?
Size
You are a helpful assistant.
How is a Dexterity characteristic generated in the game?
Roll 3D6 and multiply by 5
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an effect of having zero Dexterity score?
The investigator is uncoordinated and unable to perform physical tasks.
You are a helpful assistant.
Who acts first in combat when the character with the highest DEX?
The character with the highest DEX acts first
You are a helpful assistant.
What can a DEX roll be used for?
A DEX roll might be made to grab a support to keep from falling, to move faster than an opponent, or to accomplish some delicate task.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a character with zero DEX?
An investigator with zero DEX is uncoordinated and unable to perform physical tasks.
You are a helpful assistant.
How is an APP characteristic generated?
Roll 3D6 and multiply by 5 to generate an Appearance characteristic.
You are a helpful assistant.
What does APP represent?
Appearance measures both physical attractiveness and personality.
